item.title: NTA CSIR NET June 2025 Exam тАУ Online Form
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the CSIR UGC NET June 2025 notification for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and Lectureship/Assistant Professor in various science subjects. Eligible candidates can apply online at csirnet.nta.nic.in. Check important dates, eligibility, syllabus, and exam pattern before applying.

item.description: MPPSC has released the Vehicle Transport Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025 notification. The recruitment aims to fill multiple SI posts under the Transport Department. Interested candidates can apply online through the official MPPSC website. The notification includes details about eligibility, age limit, application dates, and selection process.

item.title: Rajasthan HC Driver Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.

item.title: Indian Army Agniveer Admit Card Download 2025
item.description: Indian Army has released the Agniveer GD Admit Card 2025 on June 16. Candidates can download it from joinindianarmy.nic.in. The Common Entrance Exam (CEE) for General Duty posts will be held from June 30 to July 3, 2025. Admit cards for other categories like Tradesmen, Technical, and Clerk/SKT will be available from June 18.

item.title: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 invites applications for 200 Excise Constable posts. Eligible candidates who have passed 12th can apply online from June 4 to June 27, 2025. The written exam will be held on July 27, 2025. Applicants from all Indian states can apply, but only Chhattisgarh residents will receive reservation and age relaxation benefits. The recruitment will be conducted by CG Vyapam, and the selection process includes a written test and physical eligibility test.

item.title: Join Indian Air Force via AFCAT 2 2025 тАУ Apply Now
item.description: Indian Air Force has released the AFCAT 02/2025 notification for the recruitment of Commissioned Officers in Flying and Ground Duty (Technical and Non-Technical) branches. Eligible candidates with a graduate or engineering degree can apply online through the official website. The application process is expected to start in June 2025, with the last date likely in July 2025. The selection will be based on a written exam, AFSB interview, and medical test. Candidates must pay тВ╣250 as the application fee. For complete details, visit afcat.cdac.in.

item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the official notification for Selection Post Phase 13 Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 2,423 vacancies across various government departments and ministries. This recruitment drive is open to candidates with Matric (10th), Intermediate (12th), and Graduation level qualifications.

item.title: Apaar Id Card Download and Apaar Consent Pdf Form
item.description: Apaar ID Card Download Apaar ID Card Download The APAAR ID card, also known as the One Nation One Student ID, is a unique 12-digit identification number for students in India. It's designed to digitally store and manage all academic credits, including scorecards, mark sheets, degrees, diplomas, and certificates. рдЙрдореНрд░ рдХреА рдЕрд╡рд┐рд╡рд╛рд╣рд┐рдд рдорд╣рд┐рд▓рд╛рдУрдВ рдХреЛ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рдорд╛рд╣ рдЖрд░реНрдерд┐рдХ рд╕рд╣рд╛рдпрддрд╛ рдЙрдкрд▓рдмреНтАНрдз рдХрд░рд╛рдирд╛ рд╣реИред ЁЯУв рдХрд░рдирд╛редрдЬреАрд╡рди рд╕реНрддрд░ рдореЗрдВ рд╕реБрдзрд╛рд░: рд▓рд╛рднрд╛рд░реНрдерд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдЬреАрд╡рди рд╕реНрддрд░ рдореЗрдВ рд╕реБрдзрд╛рд░ рд▓рд╛рдирд╛редрд╕рд╛рдорд╛рдЬрд┐рдХ
